description: Unable to send emails from Outlook
VPN disconnects frequently
System restarts automatically after blue screen
Internet speed is much slower than usual
Application crashes when opening files
User can't access shared folder on network drive
Update is stuck at 99% on Windows 10
Wi-Fi keeps disconnecting intermittently
Emails are not syncing with mobile device
External monitor not displaying anything
User's keyboard is unresponsive
resolution: Try different USB port or replace keyboard

description: System crashes with blue screen intermittently
resolution: Update drivers and scan for malware

description: CRM application is running slowly
User account locked due to multiple login attempts
resolution: Reset user password and unlock account

description: Microphone not working in Teams meeting
resolution: Check audio settings and device permissions

description: User unable to save files due to full disk
resolution: Clear temp files or move data to cloud

description: All icons disappeared from desktop
User cannot access department shared folder
Users report password reset links expired quickly
resolution: Extend the expiry date for further more one year.

description: Chrome crashes while browsing certain websites
resolution: Reset browser settings and disable extensions
